loan.name: Dickson
loan.use: to pay for a harvesting / pruning knife.
loan.description: Dickson is a farmer in an Organic and Fairtrade certified Oil Palm Company (serendipalm). He lives in Akim-Abaam in the Kwaebibirem District of the Eastern Region of Ghana, West Africa. He is 47 years old and married with a child. Dickson believes Organic Oil palm is sustainable and helps develop his community through job creation and infrastructural fair trade projects. In this regard, he wants to secure a Kiva Micro loan so that he can buy a harvesting knife for pruning and harvesting of his oil palm field
loan.whySpecial: It increases the productivity of farmers producing organic and Fair Trade palm oil.
